short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings celestial wonder and powerful search capabilities to your fingertips!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension is designed to help users to be aware of current moon phase, day and upcoming moon calendar milestones. 
With a simple click, users can access a brief description of current moon phase and image depicting the day.

By clicking "Add to Chrome" you accept and agree to installing the "Full Moon Calendar" Chrome extension and setting Chrome Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://fullmoon-calendar.com/index.php/terms/) and Privacy Policy (https://fullmoon-calendar.com/index.php/privacy-policy/)
